thread.title: Indian Railways to arrange for special train for Velankanni festival from Bandra Terminus
thread.title_full: Indian Railways to arrange for special train for Velankanni festival from Bandra Terminus | The Financial Express

author: financialexpress.com
title: Indian Railways to arrange for special train for Velankanni festival from Bandra Terminus
text:
Other Articles Reserve Bank of India may cut key rate by 0.25% on Tuesday: Moody's Barack Obama to unveil tougher climate change plan As Reserve Bank of India holds rates steady, firms debt burdens weigh heavily Indian Railways (Western Railway) will run two trips of a fully reserved special train, for which fares chargeable will be inclusive of special charges, for the convenience of passengers on the occasion of the Velankanni festival.
Issuing a statement, Western Railway said that train number 09001 Bandra Terminus-Velankanni Special will leave Bandra Terminus on August 27, 2015 at 10.50 pm to reach Velankanni on August 29, at 1.30 pm.
Similarly, train number 09002 Velankanniu2013Bandra Terminus Special will leave Velankanni at 11.45 pm on August 29, 2015 (Saturday) and arrive at Bandra Terminus at 2.20 pm on August 31, 2015, the release said.
The train will halt at Borivali, Vasai Road, Kalyan, Lonavala, Pune, Daund, Solapur, Wadi, Yadgir, Raichur, Mantralayam Road, Adoni, Guntakal, Gooty, Tadipatri, Muddanuru, Yerraguntla, Cudapah, Razampeta, Koduru, Renigunta, Arakkonam, Kancheepuram, Chengalpet, Villupuram, Tirupadaripulliyur, Chidambaram, Sirkazhi, Mayiladuthurai, Tiruvarur Junction and Nagapattinam stations during its onward journey.
However, on its return journey, the train will halt at all the above mentioned stations except Daund station.
The train will comprise AC II tier, AC III tier, sleeper class and Class II seating reserved coaches, the release said.
Booking for train number 09001 will open on August 3, 2015 at all public reservation system counters and Indian Railway Catering and Tourism Corporation (IRCTC) website.
First Published on July 31, 2015 11:31 pm
